languages.text: В паре прыжков от системы Кранах дрейфует разбитое судно, которое облюбовала горстка реколлигеров. Законность их предприятия под большим вопросом и вызывает недовольство у служителей Адептус Механикус. Однако если задаться целью, даже с нижайших слуг Империума можно получить выгоду.

traits.locale_text: В паре прыжков от системы Кранах дрейфует разбитое судно, которое облюбовала горстка реколлигеров. Законность их предприятия под большим вопросом и вызывает недовольство у служителей Адептус Механикус. Однако если задаться целью, даже с нижайших слуг Империума можно получить выгоду.

languages.text: A couple of jumps from the Cranach System, a small group of recolligers have taken up residence on a drifting wreck. The legality of their actions is far from clear and the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus are not pleased. However, if one sets a goal, one can make a profit, even from the lowest drudges of the Imperium.
languages.original_text: В паре прыжков от системы Кранах дрейфует разбитое судно, которое облюбовала горстка реколлигеров. Законность их предприятия под большим вопросом и вызывает недовольство у служителей Адептус Механикус. Однако если задаться целью, даже с нижайших слуг Империума можно получить выгоду.

traits.locale_text: A couple of jumps from the Cranach System, a small group of recolligers have taken up residence on a drifting wreck. The legality of their actions is far from clear and the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus are not pleased. However, if you set a goal, you can make a profit, even from the lowest drudges of the Imperium.

A couple of jumps from the Cranach System, a small group of recolligers have taken up residence on a drifting wreck. The legality of their actions is far from clear and the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus are not pleased. However, if you set a goal, you can make a profit, even from the lowest drudges of the Imperium.

A couple of jumps from the Cranach System, a small group of recolligers have taken up residence on a drifting wreck. The legality of their actions is far from clear and the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus are not pleased. However, if you set a goal, you can make a profit, even from the lowest drudges of the Imperium.

A couple of jumps from the Cranach System, a small group of recolligers have taken up residence on a drifting wreck. The legality of their actions is far from clear and the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus are not pleased. However, if you set a goal, you can make a profit, even from the lowest drudges of the Imperium.

languages.text: 在离克兰纳克星系不远的地方，有一小群回收专员在漂流的舰船残骸中住了下来。这种行为的合法性依然存疑，而且机械修会的仆人对他们这样的做法并不满意。不过，只要有了目标，人就能赚到钱。哪怕是对帝国最底层的苦力而言，这也是颠扑不破的真理。
languages.original_text: A couple of jumps from the Cranach System, a small group of recolligers have taken up residence on a drifting wreck. The legality of their actions is far from clear and the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus are not pleased. However, if one sets a goal, one can make a profit, even from the lowest drudges of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 在离克兰纳克星系不远的地方，有一小群回收专员在漂流的舰船残骸中住了下来。这种行为的合法性依然存疑，而且机械修会的仆人对他们这样的做法并不满意。不过，只要有了目标，人就能赚到钱。哪怕是对帝国最底层的苦力而言，这也是颠扑不破的真理。
在离克兰纳克星系不远的地方，有一小群回收专员在漂流的舰船残骸中住了下来。这种行为的合法性依然存疑，而且机械修会的仆人对他们这样的做法并不满意。不过，只要有了目标，人就能赚到钱。哪怕是帝国最底层的苦力而言，这也是颠扑不破的真理。

languages.text: クラナッハ星系から数回ジャンプした先で、回収業者の一団が漂流中の難破船に居住している。彼らの行為の合法性は明確とは程遠く、帝国技術局の従者たちは存在を認めてはいない。ただし目標を設定しさえすれば、帝国の最低の労働者からでも利益を得ることはできるのだ。
languages.original_text: A couple of jumps from the Cranach System, a small group of recolligers have taken up residence on a drifting wreck. The legality of their actions is far from clear and the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus are not pleased. However, if one sets a goal, one can make a profit, even from the lowest drudges of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: クラナッハ星系から数回ジャンプした先で、回収業者の一団が漂流中の難破船に居住している。彼らの行為の合法性は明確とは程遠く、帝国技術局の従者たちは存在を認めてはいない。ただし目標を設定しさえすれば、帝国の最低の労働者からでも利益を得ることはできるのだ。

languages.text: A unos pocos saltos del sistema Cranach hay un pequeño grupo de recolectores que habitan en una nave a la deriva. La legalidad de sus acciones dista mucho de estar clara y a los sirvientes del Adeptus Mechanicus no les hace ninguna gracia. Sin embargo, demuestran que, con un objetivo claro, es posible beneficiarse incluso de lo más bajo del Imperium.
languages.original_text: A couple of jumps from the Cranach System, a small group of recolligers have taken up residence on a drifting wreck. The legality of their actions is far from clear and the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus are not pleased. However, if one sets a goal, one can make a profit, even from the lowest drudges of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: A unos pocos saltos del sistema Cranach hay un pequeño grupo de recolectores que habitan en una nave a la deriva. La legalidad de sus acciones dista mucho de estar clara y a los sirvientes del Adeptus Mechanicus no les hace ninguna gracia. Sin embargo, demuestran que, con un objetivo claro, es posible beneficiarse incluso de lo más bajo del Imperium.

languages.text: Einige Sprünge vom Cranach-System entfernt haben sich einige Recolliger in einem im Raum schwebenden Wrack eingenistet. Die Legitimität ihres Handelns ist ausgesprochen fraglich und die Diener des Adeptus Mechanicus sind alles andere als erfreut. Allerdings kann man selbst aus den niedersten Dienern des Imperiums Profit schlagen, wenn man ein Ziel vorgibt.
languages.original_text: A couple of jumps from the Cranach System, a small group of recolligers have taken up residence on a drifting wreck. The legality of their actions is far from clear and the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus are not pleased. However, if one sets a goal, one can make a profit, even from the lowest drudges of the Imperium.

Die Legitimität ihres Handelns ist ausgesprochen fraglich und die Diener des Adeptus Mechanicus sind alles andere als erfreut. Allerdings kann man selbst aus den niedersten Dienern des Imperiums Profit schlagen, wenn man ein Ziel vorgibt.

Einige Sprünge vom Cranach-System entfernt haben sich einige Recolliger in einem im Raum schwebenden Warack eingenistet. Die Legitimität ihres Handelns ist ausgesprochen fraglich und die Diener des Adeptus Mechanicus sind alles andere als erfreut. Allerdings kann man selbst aus den niedersten Dienern des Imperiums Profit schlagen, wenn man ein Ziel vorgibt.

languages.text: À quelques sauts du système de Cranach, un petit groupe de récupérateurs s'est installé dans une épave à la dérive. La légalité de leurs agissements est loin d'être évidente et les serviteurs de l'Adeptus Mechanicus ne les considèrent pas d'un bon œil. Cependant, lorsque l'on a un objectif précis en vue, il reste toujours possible de faire des bénéfices, même en s'associant à la pire engeance de l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: A couple of jumps from the Cranach System, a small group of recolligers have taken up residence on a drifting wreck. The legality of their actions is far from clear and the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus are not pleased. However, if one sets a goal, one can make a profit, even from the lowest drudges of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: À quelques sauts du système de Cranach, un petit groupe de récupérateurs s'est installé dans une épave à la dérive. La légalité de leurs agissements est loin d'être évidente et les serviteurs de l'Adeptus Mechanicus ne les considèrent pas d'un bon œil. Cependant, lorsque l'on a un objectif précis en vue, il reste toujours possible de faire des bénéfices, même en s'associant à la pire engeance de l'Imperium.

languages.text: Küçük bir geri dönüşümcü grubu, Cranach Sistemi'nden iki sıçrama ötede, uzayda sürüklenen bir enkazı yuva bellemiş. Eylemlerinin yasallığı muallak, Adeptus Mechanicus hizmetkârları da durumdan hiç hoşnut değil. Ancak bir şeyi kafaya koyduklarında İmparatorluk'un en ağır işlerini yapan hizmetkârları bile bunu başarıp kazanç elde edebilir.
languages.original_text: A couple of jumps from the Cranach System, a small group of recolligers have taken up residence on a drifting wreck. The legality of their actions is far from clear and the servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus are not pleased. However, if one sets a goal, one can make a profit, even from the lowest drudges of the Imperium.
